Title: EZ-NFC
Description: EZ-NFC is a .NET library, written in C#, aimed at simplifying the use of NFC in applications.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
EZ-NFC is a .NET library, written in C#, aimed at simplifying the use of NFC in applications.

For the moment, the only device implemented is the ACR122, and the only tag is the MiFare1K, but others will follow :

Tags planned :

MiFare 4K
MiFare Mini
Mifare Ultralight
MiFare Ultralight C
Mifare PLUS 2K-S
Mifare PLUS 2K-X
Mifare PLUS 4K-S
Mifare PLUS 4K-X
Mifare DESFire EV1 2K
Mifare DESFire EV1 4K
MiFare DESFire EV1 8K

Devices planned :

ACR 122U
ACR 128

Plan is to implement most of tags for end of Q2.
